document.full_text: montana authorities are examining the remains of a bison from yellowstone national park found dead from suspicious circumstances on thursday after at least two other buffalo were illegally shot to death in the area.
document.title: montana probes killing of yellowstone buffalo
lines_and_colors: montana authorities are examining the remains of a bison from yellowstone national park found dead from suspicious circumstances on thursday after at least two other buffalo were illegally shot to death in the area.
